attributes.action: Provide Funding to Improve Burscough Rail Travel & Re-Open the Cafè
attributes.additional_details: The station has been completely neglected and northern rail trains are always cancelled, leaving the residents of Burscough stranded, the nearest bus to Southport and surrounding areas is a half hour or so walk to Booths. Putting funding into improving the train reliability and re-opening the cafè would help not only the citizens but also people visiting as Burscough continues to grow.
attributes.background: Introduce funding into Burscough Bridge railway station and look into re-opening the cafè

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about maintenance of railway stations and the amenities available at individual stations are a matter for National Rail, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out how to contact National Rail, including to complain about a station, here: https://www.nationalrail.co.uk/contact.aspx
